name: Snowman Arena
description:
Use possibility to adjust difficulty for each player and balance gameplay so everyone can enjoy the game even very weak players against skilled gamers.

Key Features

  • local multiplayer for 1 – 4 players (bots available)
  • play on-line with friends using Steam Remote Play
  • up to 3 players on one keyboard
  • gamepads support
  • singleplayer training against bots - became #1 in the world leaderboard
  • player’s and bot’s skill level adjustment
  • two movement styles
  • 7 maps
  • 5 projectiles and 5 power-ups

Game Modes

  • Deathmatch
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Last Man Standing
  • Highscore (singleplayer only)
